titleStmt.title: A breif account of the Popes pretences of a civil right to the Crown of England, and the answer thereunto

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Leon. Lichfield for Richard Davis, 1679. And are to be sold by Moses Pitt, at the Angel; Henry Mortlock, at the Phœnix, in St. Pauls Church Yard: and at the White Hart in Westminster Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, Eng.

place.placeName: the Angel; Henry Mortlock, at the Phœnix, in St. Pauls Church Yard:
the White Hart in Westminster Hall
